data_table.description: Vitamin Survey Form, Exam 3. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: VITA1A
variable.description: Do you regularly take multiple vitamins? Q1a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA1C
variable.description: How many pills do you take per week? Manufacturer. Q1c [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA1D
variable.description: How many pills do you take per week? Brand name. Q1d [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA1E
variable.description: Enter the 4 digit code number from the multiple vitamin code list. Q1e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA2A
variable.description: Not counting multiple vitamins, do you take any of the following preparations? Vitamin A, not including Beta-carotene. Q2a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA2B
variable.description: Not counting multiple vitamins, do you take any of the following preparations? Do you take it seasonally or most months? Q2b [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA2F
variable.description: Not counting multiple vitamins, do you take any of the following preparations? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q2f [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA3A
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin C? Q3a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA3B
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin C? Do you take it seasonally or most months? Q3b [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA3F
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin C? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q3f [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA4A
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin B6? Q4a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA4E
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin B6? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q4e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA5A
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin E? Q5a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA5E
variable.description: Do you regularly take vitamin E? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q5e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA6A
variable.description: Do you regularly take selenium? Q6a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA6E
variable.description: Do you regularly take selenium? How many pills do you take per week? Units: Q6e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA7A
variable.description: Do you regularly take iron? Q7a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA7E
variable.description: Do you regularly take iron? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q7e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA8A
variable.description: Do you regularly take zinc? Q8a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA8E
variable.description: Do you regularly take zinc? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q8e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA9A
variable.description: Do you regularly take calcium? (Include calcium in Dolomite). Q9a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA9E
variable.description: Do you regularly take calcium? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q9e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA10A
variable.description: Do you regularly take beta-carotene? How many pills do you take per week? Beta-carotene? Q10a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA10E
variable.description: Do you regularly take beta carotene? How many pills do you take per week? Units. Q10e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA11A
variable.description: Do you regularly take fish oil? (Including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA, cod liver oil). Q11a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA11C
variable.description: Do you regularly take fish oil? Do you take it as pills or teaspoons? Q11c [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12A
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Folic acid. Q12a [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12B
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Vitamin D. Q12b [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12C
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions.) B-complex vitamins. Q12c [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12D
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Iodine. Q12d [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12E
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Copper. Q12e [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12F
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Brewer's yeast. Q12f [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITA12G
variable.description: Are there other supplements that you take on a regular basis? (Please answer either "Yes" or "No" for each of the following questions). Magnesium. Q12g [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.name: VITAFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]

variable.description: How many pills do you take per week? Q1b [Vitamin Survey Form, exam 3]
